SELECT pt.id , pt.petiField , pt.petititle , pt.userId , ut.userNickName as userNickName , pt.createDt , pt.peticontent , pt.endDt
FROM petition_tbl pt LEFT JOIN user_tbl ut ON pt.userId = ut.id WHERE pt.id = #{id}

SELECT bt.id , bt.title , (SELECT count(*) from board_comment_tbl WHERE tbl='free' AND boardId = bt.id AND deleteYn=false) AS countComment , bt.content , bt.viewQty , bt.likeQty , bt.createDt , bt.createId , ut.nickname AS createName , bt.updateDt , bt.deleteYn FROM board_free_tbl bt LEFT JOIN user_tbl ut ON bt.createId = ut.id WHERE bt.deleteYn = false AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') ORDER BY ${orderByWord} LIMIT #{rowsOnePage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.update: UPDATE peti_tbl SET agreeQty = agreeQty + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND playing = false
